__e: Ben, you must take comfort in the fact that you are not alone in this.
At least there's some comfort in knowing you're in the majority.
Try and find solace in the fact that somewhere out there, your keister is doing good.
And it's possible that she might be turning to religion, to her relationship with God, because that provides her with some kind of comfort and a sense of control.
Thank you... for your comforting words.
This is a place where people find comfort and a home and...
You weren't that bad. The dog, in life, man's firmest friend, is woman's consolation in the end.
"what is and what cannot be and the consoling of what is not in our power to change".
I know how difficult it is for you right now, but at least you have the comfort of knowing how much he loved you.
So that's something for my mother to hold on to.
But what can I say to bring comfort to his mother and father?

Well, it wasn't comforting to me.
Of course, that's a great comfort to me because I just lost my career, most of my friends, my fiancé, your dad's freedom, and people died.

And all I've got to comfort myself with now is the idea that two years with me and all it's done is make you realise she's just not that bad.
